articles.title: Macklemore chants 'F--k America' to cheers at concert benefiting Hamas-connected UN agency - New York Post
articles.description: “Straight up, say it. I’m not gonna stop you. I’m not gonna stop you,” Macklemore said, appearing to reference chants from the crowd. “Yeah, F— America,” t…
articles.content:
The rapper Macklemore told a crowd of Seattle concertgoers “F— America,” according to video of his recent “Palestine Will Live Forever” performance shared on X.
